item.title: damo v2.5.7 new features: temperature filtering and formatting
item.description: damo v2.5.7 is released on 2024-11-25. Two new major features on this version are temperature-based regions filtering and formatting. Temperature “Temperature” of each memory region represents relative access hotness of the region. It is calculated as weighted sum of size, access rate (a.k.a nr_accesses) and age of each region. By default, the weights for the three properties are 0, 100, and 100. Users can manually set it using --temperature_weights option.
